title: Acute Retinal Pigment Epitheliitis (Krill Disease)
description: ARPE is an idiopathic retinopathy typically occurring in young adults (ages 10-40). On OCT it is characterised by is a dome-shaped hyper-reflective lesion at the photoreceptor outer segment layer disrupting the EZ and IZ.
